meanings.definition: The act of including or containing something
meanings.sent1: The comprisal of all necessary ingredients made the recipe complete.
meanings.sent2: The comprisal of various colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The comprisal of all the toys in the box made the room look like a toy store.
meanings.sent4: Her comprisal of different talents made her a versatile performer.
meanings.sent5: The comprisal of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of comprising or consisting of something
meanings.sent1: The comprisal of fruits and vegetables made up a healthy diet.
meanings.sent2: The comprisal of students from different countries enriched the cultural exchange program.
meanings.sent3: The comprisal of all the animals in the zoo made it a lively place.
meanings.sent4: The comprisal of different spices in the dish added a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The comprisal of flowers in the garden created a vibrant display.
